title: Van Eetvelt Celebrates Too Early in Costly Vuelta Mistake: ‘I Thought I Was Already There’
content:
Roglič steals stage win and snags leader's jersey in Vuelta photo finish: 'You learn that as a junior that you have to sprint across the line.'

Read the full article at Van Eetvelt Celebrates Too Early in Costly Vuelta Mistake: ‘I Thought I Was Already There’ on Velo.
author: ahood
